question: q-3639 - Will it be ok for me to share the apartment with 4 people on terms negotiated with the manager verbally which is not in the acutal(written) lease agreement
answer:
QUESTION
I have talked with the apartment manager (not the owner), he says its ok to share with 4 people if they donot stay there permamanently (live for a month or two and leave) , but he also says that the owner of the apartment has this rule of not allowing more than 3 people to stay in a 1 bedroom . Will it be ok for me to share the apartment with 4 people on terms negotiated with the manager verbally which is not in the acutal(written) lease agreement . JazakAllah Khair
ANSWER


Share:
If the apartment manager has the right according to his employment agreement
to grant a leeway - for the extra person to stay, then it will be
permissible.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
